page.title: 11A DAY IN THE LIFE OF M.ELLIS
page.content: At 7.00am.Mrs.Ellis got up and dressed.She fed the dog and cat.She made Mr.Ellis's breakfast.She went to school,marked the register and boarded the coach to travel to Chatsworth House.Mrs.Ellis arrived there and toured the farm.She directed the children to the Adventure Playground. At 12.30pm.Mrs.Ellis supervised the packed lunches.Afterwards Mrs.Ellis veiwed the house with a group of children.She noticed the elaborate,architecture and elegant furniture. Later Mrs.Ellis travelled to Riber Castle,organised groups of children and visited the animals.She counted the children,returned to the coach which arrived back at 5.30pm.Mrs.Ellis went home,fed the pets,had tea and weeded the garden.At 10.45pm.Mrs.Ellis went to bed,exhausted.
